methods.Synopsis: API methods for dealing with Listings

parameters.Name: keywords
parameters.Description: One or more (comma-separated) keywords to search for

parameters.Name: position
parameters.Description: One or more (comma-seperated) position names to search for

parameters.Name: position_id
parameters.Description: One position to search for via id

parameters.Name: sector
parameters.Description: One or more (comma-seperated) sector names to search for

parameters.Name: sector_id
parameters.Description: One sector to search for via id

parameters.Name: active
parameters.Description: Filter listings based on the active flag

parameters.Name: agency_id
parameters.Description: Only show listings for the given agency

parameters.Name: payment_frequency
parameters.Description: Only show listings with the given payment frequency

parameters.Name: min_salary
parameters.Description: Show listings greater than the given minimum salary

parameters.Name: max_salary
parameters.Description: Show listings less than the given maximum salary

parameters.Name: lat_long
parameters.Description: The comma seperated lat and long to search for listings near. This will not work with the location parameter.

parameters.Name: location
parameters.Description: The location name to search for listings near. This will not work with the lat_long parameter.

parameters.Name: distance
parameters.Description: The distance from the given lat/long or location

parameters.Name: save_search
parameters.Description: If the user is signed in, save this serach with the given name
